attributes.action: STOP any plans to put microchips in bins to monitor rubbish disposal following NI pilot scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Northern Ireland are currently being used to pilot the scheme. Its getting silly now. We dont need to have every area of our lives monitored and there are many factors which need to be  taken into account, like family sizes. Would they set average figures per family? what about people with different health/lifestyle needs? peoples homes? educational establishments? the paperwork would be a nightmare and the scheme another excuse to watch people and fine them at every opportunity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
